participant_1.background:
I enjoy eating homemade bread, which I often make myself.
My height is irrelevant to my legal expertise.
my country is russia.
i am not afraid of what others think.
I try to decorate our home in a way that makes it feel more like a place where we can both relax and feel at home.

participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
I spend time with my mom and my dog and enjoy a little gossip.
I love sushi because it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives.
i like fitness.
My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
Where are you from?
I am from South Africa. Where are you from?
I am from Russia.
Oh, that is very cool! I have always wanted to visit Russia.
You should! It is a beautiful country with a rich history.
I am sure it is! I love to travel.
Me too! I love experiencing new cultures and meeting new people.
I am the same way! I love getting out and exploring new places.
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to go hiking, biking, and swimming. I also love to cook and bake.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook too.
What is your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make homemade bread. It is so delicious!
That sounds amazing! I have never tried making homemade bread before.
You should! It is really easy and it is so much better than store-bought bread.
I might have to try that!
You should! Let me know if you need any help.
Thanks! I will
